Title: Business Analyst, BI
Description:
If you are a BI Analyst that wants to learn and grow in your career, and enjoy beautiful climate and living in an inexpensive geographical location, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with UsWe are an successful and growing world wide organization for over 85 years working in a variety of industrial specialty manufacturers. We are a uniquely diversified group of talented engineers and IT personnel that pride ourselves on our collaborative and team supporting environment. We are looking to hire an experience and talented BI Analyst with the desire to learn a variety of Analyst duties and to grow with our company.What You Will Be DoingIn this key role, you will be requirement gathering, assist with the design, configuration and implementation of systems to support Plant Production Intelligence Reporting. -Support the day-to-day operations and projects for significant application systems development, enhancement, and maintenance efforts.•Projects may require coordination/direction of up to 10 people.-Assist and support cross-functional teams to implement best practices in production performance recording and efficiency reporting in all functional areas. -Responsible for maintenance of SQL warehouse and MS Access forms. -Works closely with each plant manager to deliver all plant operation Business Intelligence needs. -Assist as needed with infrastructure related support areas.-Prepares project plans and manages resources to ensure the timely completion of small/medium business systems projects.-And have a desire to learn more skills!-Meet with functional or cross-functional users to determine information systems solutions necessary to achieve identifiable business benefit. Troubleshoot systems to identify and correct potential issues.-Work with production plant process owners and functional users to develop and implement best practices in work processes. -Work with all functional areas (operations, IT, maintenance) to develop and maintain best practice Business Intelligence support systems.-Manage/assist in the development of specific system requirements including time and resources needed to complete project.-Provide functional and technical support for enhancements, upgrades, and new systems development. Evaluate technical and economic feasibility of the proposed systems solutions.-Understand and manage the SQL server and MS Access forms configuration. Consult with end users and application developer’s manager to approve any improvements/changes to the BI reporting configuration. -Develop reports using end user query tools.What You Need for this Position-Minimum Bachelor's degree, Computer Science, Information Management -Experience in the design and implementation of MS SQL Server as a data warehouse-Three years of experience implementing and maintaining multifunctional Business Intelligence solutions in manufacturing. Experience with MS Access forms/reports, MS SQL Server, PL/SQL, SQL server report builder, xml, SQL Server management Studio tools and databases-Excellent oral and written communication skills, able to communicate equally well with senior management, programmers, and clerical staff.-Ability to balance changes in user requirements with project deadlines and budget constraints.-Ability to manage multiple priorities and shift focus quickly.At Least 3 Years of experience and knowledge of:Applications Systems Development- Business Intelligence- Business Analyst- Requirements Gathering- BI Reporting Configuration- Intelligence reporting- design & implementation- SQL Server  as datawarehouse- PL/SQL- SQL Server Report Builder- Manufacturing Experience- MS Access forms and reportsPlease FULLY COMPLETE THE APPLICATION QUESTIONS INCLUDING THE SELF ASSESSMENT ASAP! Complete applications will receive priority!What's In It for YouWe offer an very progressive place to work with great technology, competitive pay and benefits which includes:-Comprehensive Medical, Dental, ST & LT, Life insurances-Paid Holiday-401K matching plan - excellent 100% match program-Supplemental insurances Flex Spending and other choice programs-Employee assistance program-And more!So, if you are a Business Analyst, BI with experience looking for a mentally stimulating environment with great people and a growing company, please apply today!

Title: BI Report Developer
Description:
If you are a BI Report Developer with experience, please read on!We are a strong global organization looking for a Business Intelligence Report Developer who is strong in MS SQL Server with SSIS and SSRS.  This person should be familiar with Tableau because so much of what we produce reporting wise uses it. Title: Director of Business Intelligence
Description:
If you are a hands-on Director of Business Intelligence with experience, please read on!The description below is just a sampling of this role.  If you are interested and you feel you fit let's talk and then we can go into much greater detail!We are a well established company and a leader in our niche industry looking for a Director of Business Intelligence to join our team.  You will report in to the senior leadership team working on cloud based business intelligence solutions that affect the retail industry.  We are looking for an individual who is a strong hybrid of heavy technical who can work with the business and take a vision, create the strategy and goals and follow through with the execution.  Working with the business, synthesizing the requirements, set the direction and execute on them!You will have a team of direct reports but you too must be hands-on steeped with Business Intelligence technical skills.  Your role will work closely with the business and create the BI strategy that works with their goals and then follow the BI program through to implementation and performance going forward.  You will lead the organization and direction for the cloud Enterprise Data Warehouse, Master Data Management and Data Quality.   You must be comfortable working hands-on with databases (SQL Server), ETL tools, and have experience with Windows and Linux shell scripting and an expert with SQL.  Our environment is SQL Server, Redshift, Tableau and PostgreSQL and we are expecting you to have experience with all of them.  You must also be very strong in AWS with some knowledge of Azure.  AWS Certified Solutions Architect highly preferred!This role is all about data with a tremendous amount of reporting, therefore experience in Analytics is another strong requirement.   You will use your analytics background to create metrics that analyze the performance of the business program. Due to the nature of our business there are many programs happening at the same time so you must be able to create strong business relationships, determine priorities and manage your team to meet timely deliverables.We are leading edge and you must stay on top of all new technologies in the Business Intelligence space and prototype and/or introduce new tools and ideas that keep our company innovative and ahead of the game!What You Need for this PositionRequirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Analytics, Data Science or related field8 + years of professional information technology experience 8 + years of focusing on Business Intelligence solutions working closely with the business on vision, design and executionYou must have at least 2 full life cycle Data Warehouse implementationsStrong Experience with AWSStrong experience with Cloud Enterprise Data Warehouse solutions, building datawarehouses, ETL toolsWindows and Linux shell scriptingExperience with analyticsExperience managing a business intelligence team of at least 5+ membersExperience with Master Data Management and Data QualityExperience with Big DataHands on Experience with the following technologies are required:Amazon RedshiftSQL ServerTableauPostresSQLAWSPluses:AWS Certified Solutions Architect is a HUGE PLUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Azure experienceExperience with PowerBIExperience with Business ObjectsData Science backgroundRetail industry experienceWhat's In It for YouWe offer a strong compensation package which includes base, bonus and benefits in an environment that strives to be on the leading edge!So, if you are a Director of Business Intelligence with experience, please apply today!Local Candidates ONLY please.
                

                    Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Skills:
Preferred Skills
                
                    
                            
                                
                                    
                                    Business Intelligence

Title: Sr ETL / Tableau Developer
Description:
We are a fast growing organization that is one of the most trusted companies worldwide.  We focus on the development of robust delivery and distribution tools through the use of technology.  Our significant growth and ability to continuously win new business is largely based on the level of flexibility and customization our technology offers.If you are a Sr ETL / Tableau Developer with experience, please read on!What You Will Be DoingAs Sr. ETL/Tableau Developer on the team, you will be working with BI team to design, develop, implement and document data integration processes, as well as influence the long-term evolution of our analytics capability. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with traditional Data Warehouse concept. The candidate should have excellent communication skills and able to work with product owner to develop and define technical requirements. The candidate should have good knowledge and working experience with Tableau.What You Need for this Position•5+ years experience implementing ETL for Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence Solution•7+ Years experience in RDBMS design, development and performance tuning•Ability to create ETL specifications, unit, and system integration test cases•Build reusable components for a scalable ETL methodology such as error handling, logging and recoverability•Deep familiarity with MS SQL Server 2008 R2 to MS SQL Server 2014 database technologies and ETL best practices with MS SQL Server environment•Ability to read and write effective, modular, dynamic (parameterized) and robust code, establish and follow already established code standards, and ETL framework•Experience using Business Intelligence Development Studio to build SSIS packages•Excellent troubleshooting & optimization skills: interpreting ETL logs, performing data validation, dissecting SSIS code, understanding the benefits and drawbacks of parallelism, experience with change data capture, using expressions, scoping of variables, commonly used transforms, event handlers and logging providers, ability to understand and optimize the surrogate key generation and inconsistent data type handling.•Experience in performance tuning of the SSIS packages,  deploying and administering SSIS packages, proficient in utilizing scripting in SSIS, and replacing ActiveX script tasks in DTS with the script task in SSIS.•Ability to capture and research SSIS issues and bugs, build sample test jobs that recreate a bug, and troubleshoot the ETL until successful issue resolution.•Experience with creating data sources for Tableau•Experience with creating visuals with Tableau •Responsible for unit, string, and system testing and assisting in development of UAT test plans•Experience with NoSQL databases such Mongo DB is a plusWhat's In It for You•Competitive compensation•Comprehensive medical, dental and vision benefits•Supplemental benefit options•Generous Paid Time Off•401(k) Employer ContributionSo, if you are a Sr ETL / Tableau Developer with experience, please apply today!

If you have 5+ years of technical software development experience and always dreamed of taking a company to new heights than oh boy do I have an opportunity for YOU! We are a family owned, values driven industrial sand supplier with a team who is passionately pursuing excellence and stakeholder satisfaction. Title: Java Software Developer
Description:
If you are a Software Developer with experience, please read on!The Software Developer will be part of our SWAT team. The SWAT team is focused on providing timely response and resolutions to critical production issues of our SAAS and Dedicated Hosted Enterprise Solutions. The individual should have knowledge all aspects of software development including:  implementing requirements, unit testing, troubleshooting, packaging, deploying solutions and generating documentation.  In addition, this individual will handle issues in all tiers of our solution from Front-End to Network and Security.  The individual selected to fill this role will have the opportunity to contribute to the ongoing design and implementation of our product suite.What You Will Be Doing- Hands on trouble shooting with our Production Operations Team and Support Team for production issues- Identify scaling and performance bottlenecks and propose solutions.- Work with the Information Security Team to identify security threats and correct any vulnerabilities.- Participate in the software design process for new systems- Take initiative and develop approaches and solutions to software problems- Analyze requirements and prepare functional and software specifications for software systems solutions- Design, develop, program and test software to functional requirements- Working as part of highly collaborative and self directed Agile Scrum team that works closely with the Scrum Master, Product Owners, and Stakeholders.- Ensure the development of quality systems within established guidelines and timeframes- Work with QA to fix identified defects- May lead development projects- Building relationships with your fellow employees in our open office environment, around the pool table, and at numerous company outings.What You Need for this Position- BS. degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent experience- 2+ years experience with Java / J2EE / SQL- Strong analytical and deductive reasoning skills- Knowledge of systems analysis, software development process and/or functional engineering principlesNice to have:- Experience working in the public sector with local, state, or federal agencies a plus- Experience with business intelligence and data analysis a plusWhat's In It for You- Competitive Base Salary- Excellent benefits package including medical, vision, dental, life/ADD, STD/LTD - 401k with matchSo, if you are a Software Developer with experience, please apply today!

Title: Product Management Assistant
Description:
Based in Placentia, CA, we are an ISO 9001 manufacturing organization that manufactures and distributes a large variety of cut graphics, print media and flexible substrates products to our customers throughout the globe. Currently we have an opportunity for a Product Management Assistant. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and meeting product objectives to support our product management group and sales teams in achieving continued product growth and profitability.  Primary focus will be centered on the management and support activities for existing product lines that includes; executing marketing plans, marketing activities, price management, market analysis, competitor profiles, and product development initiatives.What You Need for this PositionThe PM Dept is currently very analytical. Analytical mindset is very important for this role. - College Degree with a concentration in BS Marketing or Business Administration. - 1-2 years’ work experience in in a professional business environment.- Strong Math/Analytical Skillset.- Advanced Excel/Spreadsheet skill set (Pivot Tables).  - Ability to elicit data and opinions.- Great Communication skills (internal and external customers).- Problem Solver/Team Player.PLUSSES:- Past work experience for a manufacturer.- Multilingual. Chinese & Spanish would be best, but any language would be great.- System experience at any level would be a plus in any area including: Salesforce, Business Intelligence Reporting, SAP and InDesign.What's In It for YouFor the chosen candidate we offer a solid base salary, comprehensive medical benefits, 401K plan with matching contribution, profit sharing and most importantly - the ability to grow your career within a dynamic organization!Are you a fit?

Title: SharePoint Developer (Applications Management)
Description:
We are a diversified media company owning publications in six states as well as owning a number of broadband providers.  Financially secure and well-managed we are positioned to enter new markets such as education, marketing and manufacturing.Technology plays a key role how we operate our businesses and plan for the future.  As such, you will have exposure to a range of technologies such as SharePoint, Power BI, Microsoft Teams and Great Plains.  If you have the ability to develop in SharePoint, you very well may be able to step into a bigger role we have in mind for you.  You will be a developer/manager handling enterprise applications and systems integration.We are looking for someone to managed and develop our enterprise applications.  This will involve working with business users to determine their functional requirements and develop those in our Microsoft stack.  You will be kept on your toes working with our Microsoft Technology stack and integrating with legacy business applications.Top Reasons to Work with UsSolid compensation plus excellent benefits such as three-weeks paid vacation available right away Great company culture, flexible work hours, training provided, wellness programOur broad and varied IT projects will give you expertise across range of industries and technologiesWhat You Will Be DoingThis position is important to our company and is responsible for the successful implementation and integration of business application products across the enterprise from project initiation to full customer production rollout.•Use common tools and industry best practices to accomplish integration between legacy systems and new technology•Prepare complex design, implementation, and maintenance plans for systems•Serve as senior level technical expert on medium and large, complex projects•Use and interpret reports from performance analysis tools to determine infrastructure needs•Create technical documentation, design documents, test case documents and deployments documents•Provides critical (Level 3-4) issue resolution as required.  Serve as business relationship manager and a trusted advisor to business partners across the enterprise.•Provide operational support for all business application systems•Manage and monitors business application integrations with 3rd party integration developers and internal staff•Work with 3rd party SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS providers•Implement best practices and act as a strategic advisor to drive innovation and continuous improvementWhat You Need for this PositionBachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Information Systems, Engineering or another related field•Experience with two or more of the following: Great Plains, SharePoint, Dynamics, Media/Publishing applications, Microsoft Teams, and/or Power BI•MCSA certification in either Web Applications or Universal Windows Platform•Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer -- App Builder preferred•Broad knowledge of and experience with various on premise business applications•Expert knowledge in application functionality and technology to provide technical consulting to business leaders•Experience managing application databases, cloud services, and application integrations•Excellent working understanding of the Microsoft technology stack, including latest cloud computing architecture•Solid understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) processesWhat's In It for YouThis is the best opportunity for any developer skilled in the Microsoft Technology stack.  You will be given management responsibility and can grow your skills across a range of applications and in a variety of vertical markets.  You will be challenged in a professional environment that offers endless opportunity.  In addition to a competitive salary ($80 to $100K) we offer excellent benefits such as three weeks paid vacation, 401K and medical.Interviews are being scheduled now.  So if you are SharePoint Developer, Microsoft stack Developer and/or skilled in Applications Management, please apply today.
                

                    Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Skills:

                                    SharePoint

Title: Developer/Project Manager with SharePoint experience
Description:
We are a diversified media company owning publications in six states as well as owning a number of broadband providers.  Financially secure and well-managed we are positioned to enter new markets such as education, marketing and manufacturing.Technology plays a key role how we operate our businesses and plan for the future.  As such, you will have exposure to a range of technologies such as SharePoint, Power BI, Microsoft Teams and Great Plains.  If you have the ability to develop in SharePoint, you very well may be able to step into a bigger role we have in mind for you.  You will be a developer/manager handling enterprise applications and systems integration.We are looking for someone to managed and develop our enterprise applications.  This will involve working with business users to determine their functional requirements and develop those in our Microsoft stack.  You will be kept on your toes working with our Microsoft Technology stack and integrating with legacy business applications.Top Reasons to Work with UsSolid compensation plus excellent benefits such as three-weeks paid vacation available right away Great company culture, flexible work hours, training provided, wellness programOur broad and varied IT projects will give you expertise across range of industries and technologiesWhat You Will Be DoingThis position is important to our company and is responsible for the successful implementation and integration of business application products across the enterprise from project initiation to full customer production rollout.•Use common tools and industry best practices to accomplish integration between legacy systems and new technology•Prepare complex design, implementation, and maintenance plans for systems•Serve as senior level technical expert on medium and large, complex projects•Use and interpret reports from performance analysis tools to determine infrastructure needs•Create technical documentation, design documents, test case documents and deployments documents•Provides critical (Level 3-4) issue resolution as required.  Serve as business relationship manager and a trusted advisor to business partners across the enterprise.•Provide operational support for all business application systems•Manage and monitors business application integrations with 3rd party integration developers and internal staff•Work with 3rd party SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS providers•Implement best practices and act as a strategic advisor to drive innovation and continuous improvementWhat You Need for this Position•Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Information Systems, Engineering or another related field•Experience with two or more of the following: Great Plains, SharePoint, Dynamics, Media/Publishing applications, Microsoft Teams, and/or Power BI•MCSA certification in either Web Applications or Universal Windows Platform•Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer -- App Builder preferred•Broad knowledge of and experience with various on premise business applications•Expert knowledge in application functionality and technology to provide technical consulting to business leaders•Experience managing application databases, cloud services, and application integrations•Excellent working understanding of the Microsoft technology stack, including latest cloud computing architecture•Solid understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) processesWhat's In It for YouThis is the best opportunity for any developer skilled in the Microsoft Technology stack.  You will be given management responsibility and can grow your skills across a range of applications and in a variety of vertical markets.  You will be challenged in a professional environment that offers endless opportunity.  In addition to a competitive salary ($80 to $100K) we offer excellent benefits such as three weeks paid vacation, 401K and medical.Interviews are being scheduled now.  So if you are Developer and Project Manager, please apply today.

Title: Accounting Manager
Description:
Sick of working in the grind of public accounting or a bad environment? Are you ready to join a place where you can see rapid growth, high-visibility & be treated like family? We are a multi-state owner, operator and third-party manager of single-family rental housing. We operate in California, Nevada,  North Carolina, Indiana, South Carolina, Arizona, Texas & others with near-term expansion efforts currently underway in the Southeast, Midwest, Arizona and Texas. As of January 2018, we have  assets under management exceeding $2 billion across a portfolio of approximately 16k single-family rental homes(& Growing!) with partners and clients consisting of Wall Street private equity firms and investment banks, family office groups and private syndicates. Come be a part of a rocket ship of a company with over 25 years of industry experience & outstanding growth potential!What You Need for this Position•5+ years related experience, preferably in a property management/real estate/Hotels/Constructions/Commercial setting•Strong experience with Analytics & Reporting, GAAP procedures and principles, Business Intelligence, etc.•Strong knowledge in SQL & Excel •Hands on project management experience•Financial Modeling, large data set & process automation experience•MUST BE a strong leader with experience managing, mentoring, guiding & directing accounting professionals at different levels •Experience managing volume - 10k+ assests is a plus•Strong knowledge of accounting principles •Yardi, Appfolio, Essbase, Hyperion or related financial software experience•Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance or related & it's great if you have a CPA or an MBA (not required)What You Will Be Doing•Leading a team of accounting professionals (analysts), providing guidance•General ledger & subledger research, analysis & process automation (QoQ, MoM, YoY)•Review, prepare, posting portfolio level journal entries•Providing financial system support, data management, streamlining accounting processWhat's In It for You- Top Pay, benefits, Perks & room for growth- Great work environment where employees are treated like family- Be a key player to our continued success & growth- Make a HUGE impact in our accounting department where you'll have a ton of visibility within our company & our parent companySo, if you are an accounting manager with relevant industry & leadership experience, please apply today!

Title: Project Manager (Digital Advertising)
Description:
If you are a Digital Project Manager who is bi-lingual in Spanish and English, please read on! We are growing rapidly need a super star to join our team.We are a leader in the Ad Networking space, based in New York! Founded a few years ago, we're making strong connections with our advertisers and targeted communities across the United States. We are leveraging targetable data optimized with a creative inventory. Our platform can effectively reach more targeted communities than anyone else nationwide.  We have a top 10 comscore rating for our industry and are committed to changing the industry two steps at a time. We believe in creating a work culture and environment that allows our teams to grow personally and professionally. We seek the best and brightest in the industry to join our team. We are currently hiring a Digital Project Manager. In this role you will have ownership and the opportunity to make an impact from day one! If you are ready to take the next step in your career, we are your next home.Top Reasons to Work with Us1. We are a leader in the Ad Network space.2. Join a world-class team.3. Experience exponential personal and professional growth!What You Will Be DoingAs the Digital Project Manager you will be responsible for daily logistics between multiple parties to ensure projects are on schedule and on budget. It's important to adhere to our white glove client approach providing a high level of consistent quality.Other responsibilities will include;- Track and document status against timeline and success metrics. - Identify and resolve issues related to the project and ensure they are delivered within scope.- Source, identify and hire talent, such as content producers and social media influencers.- Negotiate agreements with 3rd party freelancers.- Partner with internal account management team to conduct kickoff calls/meetings, weekly status, and daily stand-up meetings.- Create meeting minutes, action logs, timelines, campaign planning and documentation.- Manage costs within budget and work to minimize costs and maximize efficiency and effectiveness.- Create reports in Excel and PowerPoint.What You Need for this Position- Bi-lingual (Spanish and English)- Experience as a Project Manager in a digital advertising company or agency- Strong project management and ability to deal with deadlines- Experience with Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign (CS5/CS4)- Experience with PowerPoint and Excel- Experience working with Omni-channels advertising mediums- Experience with content marketing with a focus on digital, social and experiential in the Latin market - Experience working in a digital agency, ad network or publisher - Experience being detail oriented, solution-driven and organized- Ability to multi-task and prioritize work - Strong qualitative and quantitative analytical skills- Experience forecasting and reporting on KPIs focused on social media and influencer executions is a huge plus!- Comfortable working with colleagues, clients, and consultants in multiple time zones- Experience with Wordpress is a plus!- Knowledge of Content Management Systems (CMS) and Blogging systems are a plus!- Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experienceWe are seeking a proactive team player, who likes to get the job done in a fast-paced environment. Someone who is adaptable, confident and strives for excellence is the right person or us!What's In It for You- Medical, dental, vision, disability insurance- 401K matching- Unlimited PTO- Casual Dress Code- Flexible hours- Daily healthy catered lunches, snacks and beverages- Fun company outings (happy hours, holiday parties, etc..)So, if you are a Technical Product Manager with digital advertising experience experience, please apply today!You don't want to miss this Opportunity!

Title: Machine Learning Evangelist - Ai
Description:
If you are a Machine Learning Evangelist with a passion for Ai, please read on!TItle: Machine Learning EvangelistAlternate titles: Director Market Development, AiLocation: San Mateo, CASalary: $200k - $250k + BonusTransforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact. You will be responsible for supporting Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Robotic Process Automation (AI/ML/RPA) Market Development for our organization.  You will be reporting to the Chief Data Officer.What You Will Be DoingYou will be a leader for us! You will energetically promote, market, and develop business opportunities and markets for our organization's AI/ML/RPA solutions and capabilities. You will establish and grow relationships across the healthcare and technology industries, networking with other leaders in the space and generating strategic partnership opportunities that pioneer new imaginative possibilities. You will work across the company, business, operations, and development in identifying and prioritizing Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Robotic Process Automation capabilities.  This role is a senior role requiring interactions with C-suite, Presidents, GMs, Customers, as well as developers and architects.  You will be representing and speaking on behalf of us at AI/ML/RPA events, leading white papers on AI/ML/RPA and Healthcare, and working with Strategy and the Business on AI/ML/RPA capabilities in our existing and future products.What You Need for this PositionMUST HAVE: - Credibility in the Machine Learning/Ai world- Passion- Creativity, Abstract thinker- Strong business senseMUST WANT TO DO:- Evangelize the vision constantly so all stakeholders are aligned, have context, and understand where we are going. - Represent the customer. Be the champion and voice of customers. Build impactful, personal customer relationships. Bring the customer's voice into the creation process. Own requirements, specifications, and release plans.- Be the subject-matter expert (SME) for the AI/ML/RPA segment including a knowledge of the top ecosystem partners that make up our AI/ML/RPA segment globally.- Own the execution of the strategic plan for each market segment, which includes aligning with partner development managers who manage our technology and consulting partners focused on AI/ML/RPA, maximizing influenced revenue.- Working with partner development managers, build C-level relationships with our top partners and generate interest in new programs focused on AI/ML/RPA- Represent the strategy for AI/ML/RPA to our internal and external stakeholders including the sales teams as well as media coverage and industry events focused on the AI/ML/RPA segment- Help prioritize investment in partners who focus on the AI/ML/RPA market segment to drive incremental results- Execute go-to-market and routes-to-market plans that have clear and measurable ROI models- Work collaboratively internally to drive new solutions to market with our product management, solution architect, and professional service teams- Effectively team with communications, marketing, legal, and support- Identify strategic partners that Change Healthcare may want to recruit into the AI/ML/RPA market segment which could include leading startups, consulting companies, and established technology vendorsWhat's In It for You- Learn from the best!- Work for a well-known company who's product is used by billions across the world- Cutting Edge Technologies- Work on large scalable enterprise applications- Large room for advancement within the company- Amazing Health Benefits- Strong Vacation Policy- Strong 401k - Education ReimbursementSo, if you are a Machine Learning Evangelist with experience, please apply today!Or simply e-mail Madeline@cybercoders.com

Title: Director of Market Development - Ai
Description:
If you are a Machine Learning Evangelist with a passion for Ai, please read on!TItle: Director of Market Development - AiAlternate titles: Machine Learning EvangelistLocation: San Mateo, CASalary: $200k - $250k + BonusTransforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact. You will be responsible for supporting Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Robotic Process Automation (AI/ML/RPA) Market Development for our organization.  You will be reporting to the Chief Data Officer.What You Will Be DoingYou will be a leader for us! You will energetically promote, market, and develop business opportunities and markets for our organization's AI/ML/RPA solutions and capabilities. You will establish and grow relationships across the healthcare and technology industries, networking with other leaders in the space and generating strategic partnership opportunities that pioneer new imaginative possibilities. You will work across the company, business, operations, and development in identifying and prioritizing Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Robotic Process Automation capabilities.  This role is a senior role requiring interactions with C-suite, Presidents, GMs, Customers, as well as developers and architects.  You will be representing and speaking on behalf of us at AI/ML/RPA events, leading white papers on AI/ML/RPA and Healthcare, and working with Strategy and the Business on AI/ML/RPA capabilities in our existing and future products.What You Need for this PositionMUST HAVE: - Credibility in the Machine Learning/Ai world- Passion- Creativity, Abstract thinker- Strong business senseMUST WANT TO DO:- Evangelize the vision constantly so all stakeholders are aligned, have context, and understand where we are going. - Represent the customer. Be the champion and voice of customers. Build impactful, personal customer relationships. Bring the customer's voice into the creation process. Own requirements, specifications, and release plans.- Be the subject-matter expert (SME) for the AI/ML/RPA segment including a knowledge of the top ecosystem partners that make up our AI/ML/RPA segment globally.- Own the execution of the strategic plan for each market segment, which includes aligning with partner development managers who manage our technology and consulting partners focused on AI/ML/RPA, maximizing influenced revenue.- Working with partner development managers, build C-level relationships with our top partners and generate interest in new programs focused on AI/ML/RPA- Represent the strategy for AI/ML/RPA to our internal and external stakeholders including the sales teams as well as media coverage and industry events focused on the AI/ML/RPA segment- Help prioritize investment in partners who focus on the AI/ML/RPA market segment to drive incremental results- Execute go-to-market and routes-to-market plans that have clear and measurable ROI models- Work collaboratively internally to drive new solutions to market with our product management, solution architect, and professional service teams- Effectively team with communications, marketing, legal, and support- Identify strategic partners that Change Healthcare may want to recruit into the AI/ML/RPA market segment which could include leading startups, consulting companies, and established technology vendorsWhat's In It for You- Learn from the best!- Work for a well-known company who's product is used by billions across the world- Cutting Edge Technologies- Work on large scalable enterprise applications- Large room for advancement within the company- Amazing Health Benefits- Strong Vacation Policy- Strong 401k - Education ReimbursementSo, if you are a Machine Learning Evangelist with experience, please apply today!Or simply e-mail Madeline@cybercoders.com
                

                    Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

Title: Senior Product Marketing Manager
Description:
If you are a Product Marketing Manager with enterprise software expertise, please read on!What You Will Be Doing•Differentiate and position our product/solution while creating compelling customer value through messaging that is credible and resonates with target audience.•Describe in customer language value propositions and business benefits that resonate from the individual contributor to C-level execs for website material, blogs, and bylines.•Serve as the spokesperson for our product and evangelize with customers and press, and at conferences and user groups•Understand market competition and industry to build a winning strategy for your solutions•Product and sales presentations, event collateral, whitepapers, webinars, web videos, product demos•Support selling efforts with the latest tools, messaging, and assets•Juggle multiple projects, meet deadlines, deliver results•Empower our sales team to close deals, through training and direct deal supportWhat You Need for this Position•3-5 years Product Marketing experience in enterprise software.•BA/BS required, MBA preferred.•Understanding of business process automation, machine learning and cognitive technologies a plus.•Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to work cross-functionally.•Experience working closely with and supporting a direct field sales team, including the development of sales tools.•Strong presentation skills and confidence as a public speaker.•Ability to travel up to 10-15% of the time.Are you at fit?
                

                    Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

Description:

If you have any type of mobile solutions in your background, we want to talk to you.   Offices are located in Manhattan and you must be able to be in the office on a daily basis.  Some travel as needed.Compensation will be competitive in the marketplace.  Nice base salary + comissionsTop Reasons to Work with Us1. Artificial Intelligence is the next big thing in software2. A worldwide leader in AI (Artificial Intelligence) space3.
